name: tiffany ear warmer + cowl
sizes_available: one size - ear warmer is 20" around x 5.5" tall, cowl is 25" around x 17" long; notes to adjust both pieces are in pattern
notes:
**tiffany ear warmer + cowl** // a tunisian crochet accessory pair with alternating textured and smooth stitches that mimic knitting, worked in color-changing cake yarn

get ready to rule this winter when you slip into the tiffany ear warmer and cowl set. you’ll be shocked at how easy it is to make the cowl – practice working tunisian crochet in the round for uninterrupted blissful stitching. and the coordinating ear warmer has a cute cinched detail to make even the worst hair days much brighter. 

**materials**
-610 yards of ferris wheel yarn (3 skeins) - substitute the worsted weight yarn of your choice
-5mm crochet hook, 6.5mm single ended tunisian crochet hook, and 6.5mm double ended tunisian crochet hook at least 6" long
-scissors
-tapestry needle
-locking stitch markers
-steam blocking supplies

**techniques**
-tunisian crochet foundation and bind off
-tunisian crochet knit and reverse stitches
-single crochet ribbing
-tunisian crochet in the round
-steam blocking

**sizes**
one size - project made with recommended yarn makes an ear warmer that is 20" around x 5.5" tall, cowl is 25" around x 17" long

find the free version of this project **[here][1]**
